name: Vivy's Tower
description:
By decree of Lord Flab, CHAD (That's you) has been sent to Vivy's Tower to collect 6 months worth of tax pay from the witch Vivy. Or the whole tower, if she doesn't pay up.

Easy job; Easy pay.

Right?

FEATURES:

 - Platforming

 - Jumping

 - Dodging

 - Trying

 - Failing

 - Retrying

 - Learning

 - Growing

 - Overcoming

 - Speed Running

Since there is no point in hiding it, I will just say it:

This game is REALLY Hard; If "I Wanna Be The Guy" is the "Dark Souls" of Platforming, then "Vivy's Tower" is the "Demon Souls" counter part: Janky, Frustrating, and Unfair.

But beating it isn't impossible; Anyone can beat this game, given enough time.(Although, said people will feel just like CHAD does in the game, unamused.)

So..

umm...

Good luck.

 - Mr. Bo
